_header: Jack Dawe thou havest blasphemed and reason hast
_description: Jack Upland’s Rejoinder (to 4098.3) — in irregular non-rhyming lines, partly alliterative, partly prose

BodDig41.First Lines:
Jack dawe þou blaberest blasfemies & reson hast þou
                    nonþou leggist oft goddis lawe bot to afalse …
BodDig41.Last Lines:
…& preue ȝour lesynges soþe& þerfor daw
                    I say nomore to þe
BodDig41.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,

Camden Society

Heyworth,  Peter L.,
